TopicTitle: RE-L10 Poodle does not leave decoupler in vacuum

Articles.Content:
I have an issue where any rocket that I build, containing a stage that is powered by the RE-L10 "Poodle" engine that is attached to an equivalent-sized decoupler/separator will not decouple while in space. I've built multiple rockets under this same configuration and it's always the same result.

Edited March 12, 2023 by Tortoise
added important detail: in vacuum/orbit

I encountered this too.

What helps is to stage the decoupler first and the stage after that the engine itself.

8 hours ago, SaphireFalcon said:

I encountered this too.

What helps is to stage the decoupler first and the stage after that the engine itself.

Thanks. I actually just saw someone say this in another thread too. Looks like it works!
